short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize Articles, Videos, Threads and Selections in any Language. Your efficient AI assistant for Reading, Business and Studies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üöÄ Transform Your Browsing & YouTube Video Viewing Experience üöÄ

ReadPartner AI Summarizer: Your Ultimate Chrome Extension for Enhanced Comprehension and Productivity üìö

ReadPartner AI is the go-to Chrome summarizer extension (more features available in the ReadPartner online portal) designed to supercharge your reading, video viewing and productivity by summarizing YouTube videos, summarizing websites, summarizing PDF documents and much more. Whether you're a student, professional, business person, or avid reader, the ReadPartner AI summarizer offers a suite of powerful tools to help you get the most out of every webpage, article, document or YouTube video. ReadPartner the best AI summarizer available, is very easy to use and it comes with a free plan!

‚≠êÔ∏è Key Features ‚≠êÔ∏è

1.	Multilingual Support: Summarize content from any language and receive your responses and digests in various different languages.

2.	Article Summarization: Get concise summaries of long news and other articles with a single click. ReadPartner is the best ai for summarizing articles.

3.	Document Summarization: Open documents in your browser and receive comprehensive summaries, saving you time and effort. You can also upload PDF and other files in the ReadPartner online portal. ReadPartner is ideal as an AI research paper summarizer as it offers an AI document summarizer.

4.	YouTube Video Summarization: Summarize YouTube videos to grasp essential information without watching the entire video with one of the best AI video summarizers on the market.

5.	Selection Summarization: Select specific amounts of text and summarize them with a right click from within your web browser. This makes it easy to Summarize long texts with AI.

6.	Advanced Settings: You can modify the output language, length, type, model and more in very simple steps. No need to be tech savvy, ReadPartner is made to be simple to use.

7.	Dark Mode: ReadPartner is available in both dark and light modes, both within the online portal and Chrome extension. Because we not only value your time but also value your health.

8.	Share & Export Summaries: Share your outputs with friends, colleagues and followers in just one click. Furthermore you can export summaries to PDF or DOCX.

9.	Automated AI News Digest: Set up an automated news digest in our online portal and receive regular updates through email, text message, or your favorite messenger app.

10.	Audio Playback: Don't want to read? ReadPartner is now available with audio playback. Listen to your summaries in any language!

11. Much More‚Ä¶

üíª How to Use ReadPartner for Chrome üíª

‚¨áÔ∏è Open any website, PDF/Word document or YouTube video in your browser.
‚¨áÔ∏è Click on the ReadPartner logo in the top right corner of your Chrome Browser.
‚¨áÔ∏è Wait 1-3 seconds for your summary to be generated in the ReadPartner window.
‚¨áÔ∏è Enjoy reading or listening to your summary, adjust the summary settings the way you want.
‚¨áÔ∏è Share the summary on social media or export it for printing!

üöÄ Performance üöÄ

- Summarize even long form YouTube content such as podcasts.
- Lightning fast delivery outperforming competitors! Summaries delivered in 1-3 seconds!
- Powered by our advanced pre-processing algorithms and the most modern AI models such as GPT 4o and GPT 4o mini.

‚ùì FAQ ‚ùì

Q: What can ReadPartner summarize?
A: The ReadPartner Chrome summarizer extension can summarize from Reddit threads and YouTube videos to the most complex and technical PDF documents.

Q: How fast can ReadPartner summarize?
A: ReadPartner offers extremely fast summaries of documents, YouTube videos, websites, news, research papers, academic documents and more! ReadPartner was designed to be as fast as possible with it's modern parsing and pre-processing algorithms before letting AI do the summarization. ReadPartner on average completes summaries in industry leading 1-3 seconds.

Q: How does ReadPartner work?
A: Just open any page, YouTube video or document in your browser and click on the ReadPartner Chrome extension icon in the top right corner of your browser to generate a summary.

Q: Why should I choose the ReadPartner summary tool?
A: ReadPartner should be chosen over other summary tools due to being designed to work as fast as possible and integrate into your workflow as well as possible. You can even export, share and copy summaries in one click.

üîí Privacy & Security üîí

Your data privacy is our top priority. Your usage data is fully anonymized and kept secret in accordance with our security policy. The ReadPartner AI summarizer tool adheres to international standards, ensuring your data is secure and private. Terms and Privacy policy: https://readpartner.com/terms-and-privacy
